channel.title: Coding on Ben Petterborg
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Ben Petterborg

item.title: Radio Monitor
item.description: Heads up This project is incomplete, while certain parts are functional, don’t expect it all to work. Content on this page may also change, as stuff is added and changed. Table of Contents Introduction Commands For Civil Air Patrol Members What it does This bot listens for P25-encoded radio traffic and rebroadcasts it over discord. This project what originally build for the Ohio Wing Civil Air Patrol’s Emergency Services, for squardons with less funding would be able to still monitor radio traffic.

item.title: Host Hugo w/ Github Pages
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Getting Started Prepare your environment Building your site Introduction I had a bit of difficulty setting up Hugo to work with Github Pages, so I decided to document how I was able to make it work. Getting Started This guide assumes you already have a Hugo site. If you do not, you can learn how to here. You will also need a Github Pages repo setup, these are pretty simple, and you can use this guide.
